snippet.title: MaGMML: Episode Zero - RELEASED!
snippet.description:
Download now at the MaGMML website: http://www.magmmlcontest.com/

MaGMML: Episode Zero is a massive collaboration fangame brought to you by the team behind the Make a Good Mega Man Level series! Play as the legendary (?) Reploid (?) Zero as he journeys through over 60 different levels from 40 different creators in a unique blend of Classic, X, Zero, and ZX! With four different subweapons backed by an expanded elemental chip system from the Mega Man Zero series, over 100 CDs to collect, and over 80 bosses to fight, Zero's soul-searching, somewhat-accidentally-but-also-intentionally heroic journey is one that won't soon be forgotten.

Trailer by Yoshiatom!
